price: គេ(មូសា)បានតបវិញថាៈ ឱម្ចាស់របស់ខ្ញុំ. ពិតប្រាកដ ណាស់ ខ្ញុំខ្លាចពួកគេបដិសេធនឹងខ្ញុំ។
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhibūni
